roleset.name: to attack, harass, surround
roleset.note: BESET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'beset' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from beset.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [Wang Laboratories Inc. , Lowell , Mass.]*-1 , [*-1]beset [*] by declining demand for its computers , reported a $ 62.1 million [*U*] , 38-cents-a-share loss in its first quarter ended Sept. 30 .
example.arg: by declining demand for its computers
